Subject: Conversion Factor
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=62491402
X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph

Has anybody given any thought about a conversion factor for hired
characters to characters put on map?

I'd like to set up an 'Adjustor Program' that reads a saved game file
and adjusts the characters on a map to have experience levels that
make them competive with your hired team.  I was thinking about taking
the average experience level of the saved game team, mutiplying that
by 3/4 to come up with approximate experience level numbers for your
opposition.

This something I'd really like to have: characters in scenarios whose
strength is always a close approximation to your own team.

This is an idea for Open Glad Enhanced, essentially producing dynamic
scenarios where it plays well for a beginner team and adjusts itself
to be harder for a well-experienced team.
